text: Rui Maria de Araújo (born 21 May 1964) is an East Timorese politician. He was the Prime Minister of East Timor from 2015 to 2017.Sapo Notícias (Lusa): Novo PM "sereno, calmo e otimista" no dia da tomada de posse, 16. Februar 2015 , retrieved, 16 February 2015. He is a member of Fretilin. He was Minister of Health from 2001 to 2006 and Deputy Prime Minister from 2006 to 2007. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of East Timor
title: Rui Maria de Araújo
